ul.li: Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-NullFlavor where concept is-a NI

description.value: **Description:**The value is exceptional (missing, omitted, incomplete, improper). No information as to the reason for being an exceptional value is provided. This is the most general exceptional value. It is also the default exceptional value.
